name: Free Candy (Gerbil)
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULLSCREEN

Submission to Beginner's Circle Jam 2 : Candy

Your sister has been kidnapped by the Candy Man. Find her and get out of his place before he finds you.  Collect keys to unlock doors, and grab some candy along the way. Light draws attention!

Controlls: 

W,S,A,D - movement

Right Mouse Button - flashlight controll

Programmer - Gerbil
Art & Concept - SinigangShake
Music- Dymtro Nebesh
